scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && git add . && git commit -m "chore: bump version to $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")"
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && git add . && git commit -m "chore: bump version to $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")"
scripts.version:major: npm version major && git add . && git commit -m "chore: bump version to $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")"
scripts.publish:patch: pnpm run version:patch && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: pnpm run version:minor && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.publish:major: pnpm run version:major && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
